title: Investing Q&A: Small Caps vs Large Caps, Increasing Your Circle of Competence and Should Value Investors Buy Gold? Part 1 - Ep 66
itunes:title: Investing Q&A: Small Caps vs Large Caps, Increasing Your Circle of Competence and Should Value Investors Buy Gold? Part 1 - Ep 66
description:
Nearly every year, Vitaliy does a Q&A-style lecture for students at universities in Denver. But since campuses are closed, he decided to take this year's talk online. This podcast is part 1 of 2 of that recording. Enjoy!

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
